Description: Actual Net sales (internal sales) in Euro
Budgeted Net Sales in Euro
Turnover (Manufacturer) - Sum of the sales at the price level for the manufacturer
Turnover (Public) - Sum of the sales at the price level for the end consumers, this field is pertinent only to CHC
Conversion of volumes of diabetes injectable products in a common unit (International Unit = IU) in order to compare basal, rapid & premix products head to head.
Metric to monitor GLP1 and FRC (fix ratio combination) to compare them to other injectable diabetes products
Pack (volume unit) : number of packs contained in a box (from raw data)
Budgeted Patients (Patient Equivalent - Finance source - For Genzyme only)
Price value (public price in euro)
Patient Equivalent (PEQ) : To compare products within the same market independently of indication, dosage, treatment regimen, compliance (Kevzara market)
Volume or value metric based on the market and applicable only for the porfolio view
Whether (RX) or not (No RX) a prescription drug

Standard Units (volume unit) : The number of standard �dose� units sold. (Calculations in calculation sheet). It is determined by taking the number of counting units sold divided by the standard unit factor which is the smallest common dose of a product form as defined by IMS HEALTH For example, if we receive "Simvastatin 1 box of 30 pills of 20 mg" --> SU = 30
Actual Net Sales in Volume ( in Standard Units)
Budgeted Net Sales in Volume (in Standard Units)
Treatment days : Number of Days of Treatment to compare products within the same market independently of dosage and treatment regimen (APA wo ASA market, LLT market, Prostate cancer)
Units : Volume Unit received in the raw data For CHC : unit = pack For others BU(s) : only if retail channel and unit defined by pack by the country : unit = pack

Actual Net Sales vs budget in percentage (%) for PE
Actual Net Sales vs budget in percentage (%) for Standard Units
Actual Net Sales vs budget in Absolute number for Euro
Actual Net Sales vs budget in Absolute number for PE
Actual Net Sales vs budget in Absolute number for Standard Units
Evolution Index: Ratio between growth for actual period and a previous period for the selected metric Evolution Index =
((Product growth vs PY % + 1) / (Market growth vs PY % + 1) ) X 100
Evolution Index of the current year vs Evolution index of Previous year (growth - evolution of this month compared to previous year) for the selected metric
Actual Net sales in value (Euro)
Budgeted Net sales in value (Euro)
Growth vs Market : sales growth (for the selected metric) of the product (or corporation) divided by sales growth of the market (or all corporations)
Growth vs Previous Year : Growth in percentage compared to the previous period for the selected metric
Market share : A percentage of total sales in a market captured by a brand, product, or company for the selected metric

Field Name: MS vs PY / MS gain/ loss
Description: Market share vs Previous year : comparison of a percentage of total sales volume in a market captured by a brand, product, or company vs previous year MS for the selected metric
Actual Net Sales in PE
Budgeted Net Sales in PE
Actual Net Sales in SU
Budgeted Net Sales in SU
Year to go: what's left of the year for the Net Sales (in EU) YTG = SUM ( all months ) - YTD
Year to go: what's left of the year for the Net Sales (in PE) YTG = SUM ( all months ) - YTD
Year to go: what's left of the year for the Net Sales (in SU) YTG = SUM ( all months ) - YTD
% Year to go: what's left of the year divided by total year for the Net Sales (in EU) % YTG = (SUM ( all months ) - YTD)/ SUM ( all months )
% Year to go: what's left of the year divided by total year for the Net Sales (in PE) % YTG = (SUM ( all months ) - YTD)/ SUM ( all months )
% Year to go: what's left of the year divided by total year for the Net Sales (in SU) % YTG = (SUM ( all months ) - YTD)/ SUM ( all months )
Moving annual total : last 12 months data for the selected metric
Month : latest month of data received by the country (for the selected metric)
Rolling quarter : last 3 months of data (for the selected metric)
Quarterly : last 4 months of data (for the selected metric)
Rolling 6 months : last 6 months of data (for the selected metric)
Year to date : Period beginning the first month of the current calendar up to the latest month data
Historic of the data : Charts show only for latest 1 year of data points
Historic of the data : Charts show only for last 2 years of data points
Historic of the data : Charts show only for last 3 years of data points
Data on last period in common that we received from countries in the scope
Data on last period of each country received
The arrow represents the evolution trend. It is calculated by the comparison of average of MAT , MTH and RQTR
Growth of the product or market or corporation chosen vs Growth of the total market
Evolution Index of the product or market or corporation chosen vs Evolution Index of the total market
Stacked bars to compare the growth of the product/market/corporation chosen vs others included in the total market
Evolution of Market Share of a product/market/corporation/country chosen vs others included in the total market
Absolute sales of a product/market/corporation/country chosen vs others included in the total market

Market share evolution of a launch product. It starts from 0, when the product was launched. This chart is available only for products launched less than 37 months ago.
